Html: I get an exception when running this program. I am 90% sure it is becuase we have a firewall, and that any attempt to go out the the web have to go out through a proxy that needs username, password.

Hi,

Sorry about that. The utility is just a small app I developed for fun. I don;t plan to make a more elaborate version for proxies, to be honest. To be notified of new versions, check my blog (http://blog.galasoft.ch) or my Twitter feed (http://www.twitter.com/lbugnion).

Friendly,

Laurent
